title: Problems with BigAir Community Broadband
body: Recently been having random disconnection problems while in game, and I feel as though it is down to the ISP since two of my friends on the same ISP (different network in different houses) are also having the same problem, and while in game together, we all drop out for up to 20 seconds at a time, randomly, but always simultaneously. Has this problem occurred before? It's beginning to get rather frustrating -.-

replies.body:
we can see BigAir players outside of Sydney getting more than 5% packet drop to our game servers. 
Anything above 1% is noticeable in game and anything above 2% is going to be problematic to play.

I suspect there's congestion somewhere on their network. 
My advice is to log a ticket with BigAir
